documents.document: Sane is absolutely devastating. City have got a proper player if they don't fuck him up
@DermotDrinan Understandable. Who wouldn't be?
@DermotDrinan oh and stop mentioning John in all your updates 🙈just stop!
@bri_hurley chief bell end would be more apt. Proper boring muppet
@rossjack23 could be the Monday night game at a push but can't see it not being Sunday mate
@rossjack23 will defo be the Sunday. Can't be Friday or Monday really and Saturday is a stretch although they've done it before in PL - 2007
@rossjack23 @SpursOfficial @EmiratesFACup great draw, been a few years off the fixture list. One of the best aways imo
Townsend on the move again? Validation once more to all those that suggested he wouldn't make it. Show pony with no future
Hope Sutton and Lincoln draw each other. Be very FA Cup like to have a non league team in the quarter finals
I think I would fancy either Millwall/Blackburn at home or Fulham away in the 5th Round with City v Arsenal and Utd v Chelsea #winning
@DermotDrinan on another level
@DermotDrinan you vicious bastard 😉
@PelsOfWisdom I'm hoping so, been too long for my man! Hope all is well with you P!
Amazing final between Federer-Nadal. Congrats to Roger, very disappointed for Rafa but he will be back in Paris!
Deserved win for Leo Santa Cruz over Carl Frampton. The final instalment of the trilogy in Belfast for May/June?
@daRealAkinfenwa thought you were superb today along with your team mates. Gave us a better game than most Prem sides. All the best 👌🏼
@wwfcofficial superb showing from you guys. Deserved a lot more than you got today but hopefully you get the rub in the promotion race #COYS
Wycombe's support a credit to their club and league 2. All the very best for the east of the season from a very relieved Spurs fan
Commiserations to Wycombe Wanderers, deserved a replay at least. Put up a better show than most PL teams have against us at the Lane
Just seen Bent's own goal. Now that is the Darren Bent we all know and love.
It is one of the biggest mysteries how Leicester could win a league title over 38 games. They are so poor, nothing has changed bar the luck
Great to see a grand slam final of Federer v Nadal again. If it's half as good as Wimbledon 2008 then it will be unbelievably good
@pikeyman1975 @ARABIANKNIGHT_3 @diydivorcerev I think that might be something he isn't even telling me. Terrible weather to be in the shed
@ARABIANKNIGHT_3 @pikeyman1975 @diydivorcerev we don't have a song Ashad
@pikeyman1975 big signs. People with sheds or annexes in Watford should like out for a salmon coloured stray over coming days
@pikeyman1975 not been dumped again has he?!
Knew there was a reason I always thought Rory McGrath was a smug gooner prick. What an absolutely desperate twat
Tribute to Bill Nicholson Happy Birthday to the Best Manager we ever had. The club that Bill built #COYS https://t.co/rZB68mzyaF
Fair play to Southampton. Great counter attack goal. Thought it was totally nailed on for a Liverpool-Man Utd final #EFLCup
@teamginola happy birthday to one of our greatest players in the PL era. Absolute legend #lemagnifique
Piers Morgan showing his complete clamishness today over Ewan McGregor. Demonstrating what a complete tool he is yet again #bellend
We are in great shape. Come Feb 12th we have played all our rivals away from home with only Utd and Arsenal to come at WHL. Bring it on
Not concerned with Arsenal going above us, it's about reeling Chelsea back in. We did our bit, now it's up to Arsenal/Liverpool
That's actually a good outcome from a Spurs and league perspective. Gives Arsenal real motivation to get at least a point of Chelsea in 2wks
How enjoyable will it be to see the now so obnoxious Leicester fans suffer a relegation straight after winning the league #karma #hope
@traditionaldec greetings Richard, hope life is treating you and the family well, all the best from you're favourite rudeboy 😂
@SebSB 🙈 at least you know for next time when they schedule Spurs at 1730 up there!
@SebSB did it take you the 20 mins as said?
@bri_hurley bore off. I know how this turns out.
Harsh on City but the amount of times we have been fucked over by a terrible game changer means I don't really give a solitary fuck #COYS
Shame Berahino has ended up at Stoke. A top player is in there somewhere. Jeremy Peace got his way, got a lot less money and ruined a career
@hwlynn never mind following me, go to bed, you are desk at 0700 for 12 hrs!
@SebSB took me 20 mins after City-Spurs last season from the away end
@borstalboy24 @KXSteelers @Stanford_RFC @essexrugby what's it got to do with you?
Danny Garcia's dad is an absolute tool. Really hope @keithfthurmanjr knocks both of them clean out on March 4th #onetime #147
@sshields10 how you guys getting on in the league cuz?
City are so immobile, we really should be winning at The Etihad next week. They can't cope with any high press. 3 points for the taking.
@bri_hurley @karren_brady @HKane couldn't agree more. It's bordering on mentally unwell the time she spends discussing Spurs #haveadayoff
@bri_hurley @karren_brady @HKane as per my tweets earlier. The woman is like a stalker. Talking out of turn at every opportunity
Accept the fact you are at a minor London club and you cocked up the taxpayer funded lifestyle and stop commenting on Tottenham Hotspur #tit
Stop obsessing with anything related to Spurs, it's become embarrassing. Karren Brady is virtually a stalker when it comes to anything Spurs
For someone so well educated Brady comes across as a complete moron at times. Complete and utter idiot would be an apt description
You would think Karren Brady had better things to worry about rather than comment on Harry Kane and the birth of his child. So busy.
The irony of the Costa situation at Chelsea. Karma in full effect there. A defeat tomorrow and everyone will be feeling Chelsea are wobbling
RIP Graham Taylor. Sad loss of a gentleman within football. Hammered for his England time unfairly overall. #RIP
Final death knell for the World Cup. 48 teams, 16 groups of 3. In situ from 2026. What an absolute pile of shit that will be.
Haha! Spurs v the Beast! Akinfenwa and Wycombe come to the Lane!!!!
Not sure who I want in the 4th round. Away to a team we haven't played in ages like Ipswich/Derby/Brighton or home to Man City #FACup
Congrats to Harry Kane on the birth of his first child. Definitely knows where the back of the net is that lad
@bri_hurley watch how they bust a gut next week #shithouses
@EHertsRrlPolice @EnvAgency who the hell does things like this?
That win felt damn good I must say #COYS #chelsearentboys #13andyoufuckeditup
@teendrive don't see it with this one. It's a sale, if sanctioned, that will see Sunderland relegated. Costs more in the long run.
Why West Ham think Sunderland would sell Defoe I have no idea. Without him they are done. Hardly going to strengthen a rival
Wow......... Bournemouth really turning it up. Come you Cherries!!!!!
@SkyKaveh of course he did. Don't suppose he brought supporting evidence of said bid. Proper Walter Mitty.
@JamesClayfield happy new year to you and Suzy mate! Can't believe LA was a year ago!
On to Wednesday now where a win puts down a proper marker. Leaves us in a good position re top 4. Title talk is nonsense imo
Fair play, that is an amazing goal from Giroud. Always think he cops a harsh deal from Gooners mainly. Pretty efficient forward overall
Great win again from the boys. Don't care about the lack of platitudes. Let's go under the radar & let everyone talk about Liverpool/Chelsea
@DermotDrinan and to you D, thank you
I'll be at the Roof Gardens seeing in the new year with the flamingos (& missus). Wherever you are, have a good one and all the best in '17
Well it's goodbye to 2016, a year that's been more lows than highs especially on a personal level but that's life. Roll on 2017 & happiness
Can't wait for it tbh, hope we kick the absolute shit out of them like we did in May. Horrible club with horrible fans to boot
Ok, Stoke have had a go but they aren't coming back three times. Gonna be up to us to derail those corrupt wankers from West London #COYS
@DailyMirror hardly within the public interest. I'm sure that all the tabloids won't be happy until he has been driven to his death.
Proud of everything our club do for charity and in the local community. We have a group of players that have bonded… https://t.co/qHnCzucHlw
Always nice to get a good solid victory over the Xmas period. A win and a clean sheet v Watford and we are setting ourselves up for 2017
All this talk of Vertonghen copping an FA Charge.......I would expect Fonte to be getting the same treatment if we are being fair about it
RE last retweets, just confirms that whenever Spurs score or concede, they cannot be relied upon to carry on and just nail that result
They will have to go some to better your record. Absolute pleasure to see you play for our club and buy into the et… https://t.co/KLZZ2IqJyi
Going through most of that list is unreal. Absolute icons who transcended their own industry to be recognisable by… https://t.co/bY4yfEMO2K
How long is left in 2016? Are we expecting anymore late departures? #yearisfucked
@DermotDrinan still time for 2016 to go someway to righting the wrongs of this dreadful year
Love this place. Pure Opulence. Would love to do a few more nights. Thanks @RenHotels St Pancras for a lovely Chris… https://t.co/iuVZmbTYDL
Bath time @RenHotels St Pancras https://t.co/TqQPMh4otG
This year has been fucking unbelievable for bad news, it can do one. Roll on 2017 and let's hope for some more cheerful happenings
Unbelievable. George Michael, Rick Parfitt.......seriously, 2016 has been absolutely horrendous for bad news all round. #georgemichael #RIP
George Michael dead apparently. Jesus, 2016 is trying to finish the way it started RIP
Ah well, guess it's time to head to St Pancras then #hardlife #someonehastodoit #whyalwaysme
Merry Christmas to one and all, all the best over the festive period and a happy new year.....oh and up the Spurs and 6 points please! 😀
Couldn't happen to a nicer person and at a better time #Pardew #cpfc
Know what I mean fam #genepool https://t.co/G98F8TmWxt

So disappointing if we end up drawing this. Exactly the sort of result that left us always chasing last season
@JournoSpursEmma would be amazing on so many levels if at least the first two mentioned go through the trapdoor #karma
RIP Michael Nicholson. Top class reporter/correspondent for ITN #welcometosarajevo
That time of the year #hohohoho #notthetypeyourthinking https://t.co/Iv0XRQ7oJv
@MattHughesTimes @stylishriot all Dier needs to be concerned with is performing much better than he has so far. Nothing else is important
